Reviews.Title: Excellent quality of this product
Reviews.Author: jose gregorio
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality of this product. I received exactly what I bought. I arrive on time and be satisfied. I recommend it with my eyes closed. buy again in the future. THANKS

Reviews.Title: it was just perfect
Reviews.Author: Koffee M. Akpene
Reviews.Content: unlike some other unlocked phone that gives though time to use, this one was very simple. i just insert my phone card and the rest was done automatically.  and never encounter any problem with this phone....

Reviews.Title: Phone has ISSUES
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: When i got this phone it has a wifi issue where the wifi was greyed out. I simply rose my eyebrow and just restored it on Itunes and the problem was fixed! Yay so happy (cue sunshine and rainbows) right? No. Just 2 weeks after i did that i had the wifi issue again and very calmly i backed up my Iphone and restored it.Nothing. It still wasnt fixed. Now i was sweating a bit.I tried everything it said on the apple website but still no luck. Unfortunetly for me they wont take my iphone back because i waited longer than 30 days (heaven forbid i notice a problem after 30 days!) so now im stuck with a wifi-less Iphone and im heading to apple tomorrow to see if i can fix it. If not i just wasted 500 dollars.Seller claims they are low profit (which is hard to believe since they just basically robbed me of 500 dollars) so they cant give me a refund for a DAMAGED product. Really? Not buying from this seller again. I WILL be contacting Amazon with a claim.

Reviews.Title: It's an iPhone...
Reviews.Author: sickle
Reviews.Content: Everyone knows about iPhones, I prefer them over android but it's preference. As of JAN 2013 if you don't own one now wait for the 6, it's gonna be alot better then the 5, although the 5 will handle the upcoming iOS but the 4S wont so make your choice off of that info.

Reviews.Title: Iphone international unlock
Reviews.Author: RodrigoS "Ro-Ro"
Reviews.Content: Real unlocked for international use. I am using this phone with difference chips in different countries with no problem. Strongly recommend it if you live outside the US
